mapper.select: SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
UPDATE HCBOARD SET CHKS=#{chks}, CALWITH=#{calWith} ,CHKSS=#{chkss} WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
UPDATE HCBOARD SET ENDLIST=#{endList} WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS FROM HCBOARD WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT ID FROM HCMEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT ID, PASSWORD, NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, ENABLED, ROLE FROM HCMEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password} AND ENABLED = 'Y'
SELECT SEQ, ID, NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, ENABLED, ROLE, TTPOINT, TDPOINT FROM HCMEMBER WHERE ID=#{value}
UPDATE HCMEMBER SET ADDRESS=#{address}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE Id=#{id}
UPDATE HCMEMBER SET ENABLED='N' WHERE Id=#{value}
SELECT SEQ, ID, NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, ENABLED, ROLE FROM HCMEMBER ORDER BY NAME
UPDATE HCMEMBER SET ROLE=#{role}, ENABLED=#{enabled} WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS FROM HCBOARD ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
